entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 04:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -21.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -23.9°C
Wind: E 82 km/h gust 93 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains this morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
